Text: This is the only copy I can find so I'm gonna take a chance and hope this is watchable...

I saw this film years ago. Not a bad little flick, kinda weird but films were strange in the 70's, oh and more hairy....lol. 
I was hoping we could possibly get a seed on this please, I'm stuck at like 89.3%. 
I'd actually buy this one but I can't find it on shelves.
nice upload btw. It's really nice to be able to find classics when you need em. If it weren't for ppl like you, we'd be stuck with the trendiest latest crap and the classics would die off.
